textos_fuente.text: Papa Joes Bayside â€“ Hidden Hangout on St. Andrews Bay Home about Pickleball food Drinks schedule Things to do Events Rentals Jet Skis Fishing Charters Contact Home about Pickleball food Drinks schedule Things to do Events Rentals Jet Skis Fishing Charters Contact YOUR LOCAL HIDEAWAY HANGOUT Overlooking beautiful St. Andrews Bay, Papa Joe's Bayside is Panama City's new little piece of paradise. CHECK US OUT WE OFFER FOOD TRUCKS Check the calendar below for our weekly lineup of local food trucks or visit our Facebook and Instagram pages. As always, our Papa Joe's food truck will be parked Bayside offering yummy coastal creations. FULL BAR Tequila Joe's offers your favorite, thirst-quenching booze from our mobile truck. We kindly ask that you please leave your coolers at home. DOWN AT THE DOCK Head down to the docks and check out our fleet of pontoon boats. Offering full-day and half-day rentals at competitive pricing, Papa Joe's Pontoons is the best way to get on Island time. Or schedue your next fishing trip with our inshore charter company, located down at Papa Joe's dock. LIVE ENTERTAINMENT There's no better place to listen to great beats than by the bay. Live music offered seasonally. Check our Social Media pages for our weekly lineup of artists. VIEWS Looking for somewhere to escape? Grab your family, friends, pups, or whoever and enjoy a day by the water at Papa Joe's. You can even come by boat! Just make sure you stay until sunset! PICKLEBALL Get ready to serve, rally, and smash at our brand-new pickleball courts located right on the bay! Weâ€™ve added four state-of-the-art courts to our outdoor venue, perfect for players of all skill levels. Whether you're a seasoned pro or just learning the game, Papa Joeâ€™s Pickleball offers a fun, competitive environment paired with stunning bay views and access to food and beverages. Introducing Papa Joe's Pickleball at Papa Joe's Bayside! Pickleball Get ready to serve, rally, and smash at our brand-new pickleball courts located right on the bay! Weâ€™ve added four state-of-the-art courts to our outdoor venue, perfect for players of all skill levels. Whether you're a seasoned pro or just learning the game, Papa Joeâ€™s Pickleball offers a fun, competitive environment paired with stunning bay views and access to food and beverages. Choose from daily guest fees or join with one of our membership options to make the most of your experience. Enjoy tournaments, clinics, and casual games as we build a vibrant, welcoming pickleball community at Papa Joeâ€™s Bayside. Come play and be part of the action! We are currently open for 2-hour Open Play sessions! COASTAL CREATIONS PAPA JOE'S MENU With food in one hand and a drink in the other, our handheld food is perfect for socializing and having a good time. COASTAL CREATIONS JAVA JOES Start your day right with fresh coffee drinks, delicious breakfast sandwiches, pastries, parfaits, and refreshing smoothiesâ€”all served with a beautiful bay view! WHERE IT'S ALWAYS FIVE O' CLOCK TEQUILA JOE'S Offering premium top-shelf liquor, local craft beer, and wine there's something for everybody. MARGARITAS COCKTAILS Tequila Joeâ€™s Margaritas: Casamigos Premium 100% Blue Weber Agave Tequila, Triple Sec, Natural 100% Organic Tres Agaves, Lime Garnish, Salted or Sugar Rim Margarita Flavors: Classic, Pineapple, Strawberry, Watermelon, Mango & Peach Blue Hawaiian Margarita: Camarena 100% Agave Tequila, Triple Sec, Splash of Orange Juice, Natural 100% Organic Tres Agaves, Blue Curacao, Salted Rim Redneck Margarita: Camarena Silver 100% Agave Tequila, Dailys Margarita Mix, Splash of Orange Juice, Salted Rim Tequila Joeâ€™s Spicy Margarita: Camarena 100% Agave Tequila, Triple Sec, Splash of Orange Juice, Natural 100% Organic Tres Agaves, Slices of Jalapenos Carajillo: Licor43, Expresso Cantarito: Lime, Lemon, Orange Juice, Tequila, Grapefruit Juice, Sprite Georgia Peach: White Rum, Peach Schnapps, Cranberry Juice, Orange Juice, Sweet & Sour Joeâ€™s Paradise: Rum, Coconut Rum, Pineapple Juice, Splash of Grenadine, Garnished with Cherry Paloma: Grapefruit Juice, Tequila, Lime Peach Please: Jim Beam, Peach Schnapps, Orange Juice Red Snapper: Bourbon, Amaretto, Splash of Cranberry Juice, Garnished with Cherry Royal Flush: Crown Royal, Peach Schnapps, Cranberry Juice Sex on the Bay: Vodka, Peach Schnapps, Cranberry Juice, Orange Juice Live Music and Food Truck events are weather pending Schedule Sometimes bands and trucks have to move last minute we communicate all these changes on our Facebook and Instagram. Check us out on social for the most current line ups. Current Month september, 2025 AT PAPA JOE'S BAYSIDE EVENTS The perfect location for every occasion! Papa Joeâ€™s Bayside is the perfect venue for birthday parties, weddings, holiday parties, corporate events, and more! Our team of professionals is here to make your event dreams come true with customized event planning. Call 850-230-4630 Or email sales@rahospitality.com Operated by Salty Pontoons Explore the Bay with Papa Joeâ€™s Pontoons We're excited to announce that while pontoon boat rentals continue to be a highlight at Papa Joeâ€™s Bayside, they are now proudly operated by Salty Pontoons. Enjoy the same great location with the added expertise and service of Salty Pontoons to enhance your on-water experience. THE KNITTY GRITTY READ BEFORE BOOKING OUR PONTOONS We offer quality, clean, and affordable pontoon boats that come equipped with either a 40 HP, 60HP, or 90 HP motor, Bluetooth radio, swim ladders, and life jackets. We have boats that can accommodate 8 and 12 passengers. HOW TO BOOK Click on the book now below above or call (850) 695 - 1958. We offer both half-day (4.5 Hours), and full-day (9 Hours) rentals depending on the length of time you'd like to occupy the boat. SAFETY FIRST All vessel operators are required to be at least 18 YEARS OF AGE with a valid ID. All renters born ON OR AFTER JANUARY 1, 1988 MUST HAVE a Florida boaters license or boaters safety card. Pontoon boats are about the safest vessels out there to operate, especially for newbies who have never driven a boat. Youâ€™ll find our pontoons offer a smooth and safe ride for the whole family. All boats come equipped with USGC safety equipment and life jackets. INCLEMENT WEATHER WOES We are known as the sunshine state but we understand the occasional thunderstorm can pop up and cut your trip short. If the weatherman is predicting bad weather we ask that you call at least 24 hours in advance to receive a full refund. BOOK A PONTOON RENTAL HERE Grand-MÃ©re Shell Island Cruises Operated by AAA Jet Skis Jet Ski Adventures Await! Experience the thrill of the waves with AAA Jet Ski's, now bookable right here through Papa Joeâ€™s Bayside. While we host a variety of activities, please note that the jet ski rentals are conveniently located just down the road from us, on the west side of the port at the foot of the bridge at 5611 US-98 SUITE 1, PANAMA CITY, FL 32401. Itâ€™s a quick trip to where your water adventure begins! AAA Jet Skiâ€™s is the only jet ski company that offers dolphin tours with guided and unguided ride time. If you are familiar with our waterways and have jet ski experience, we also offer unguided jet ski rentals! View our rates and tour information below. 2-HOUR SHELL ISLAND DOLPHIN TOUR Visit Shell Island and swim with the Dolphins! $139 â€“ 9:00am tour $149 â€“ 11:30, 2:00, and 4:30 tour Two guests per jet ski,Â with a max weight of 350 LBS This tour is a moderate to medium-paced tour. Follow your AAA Jet Ski guide from the tranquil waters of St. Andrew Bay into the emerald green waters of the Gulf of Mexico as you see bottle-nosed Dolphins. The guided portion of the Shell Island tour is approximately one hour, the remaining time is yours to explore at your own pace without the guide or group. At the conclusion of the tour, the group will gather and ride back together. Â You are required to bring a phone to keep up with your time. The guide will instruct you when to return so that the group can make it back to the marina on time. You may also bring water or aÂ sports drink with you. UNGUIDED JET SKI RENTALS Explore Shell Island on a jet ski in Panama City Beach, no guide required! Cruise the Gulf around the island or drop anchor and snorkel secluded areas of Shell Island Beach! AAA Jet Ski provides a map of our area and then your on your way to explore the waterways. Unguided rentals can be booked over the phone. One Hour RentalÂ $125 Two Hour Rental:Â $199 Half Day Rental:Â $349 Full Day Rental:Â $549 BOOK A JET SKI HERE GUIDED FISHING TRIPS FISHING CHARTERS Heading out on the water? Let an experienced and locally owned inshore fishing guide take you. Departing and returning from our private dock, Panama City Inshore knows all the best local spots. Book your next fishing trip by checking out their site below. (WJHG) By Alex Joyce Published : Apr. 11, 2022 at 4:28 PM CDT Email This Link Share on Facebook Share on X (formerly Twitter) Share on Pinterest Share on LinkedIn PANAMA CITY, Fla. (WJHG/WECP) - Easter weekend is upon us and Papa Joeâ€™s Bayside in Panama City plans to bring a fun event. The fun starts this Friday and Saturday with food trucks, live music, and fun activities. â€œWeâ€™ve got a lot of stuff for the entire family,â€ Cassandra Ducote, the General Manager Papa Joeâ€™s Bayside, said. Activities include an Easter egg hunt, axe throwing, and a vendor village with over 40 vendors. â€œWeâ€™re going to have everything from local boutiques, to woodworking, home dÃ©cor, local honey, canned goods, jewelry, and soaps,â€ Bill Davenport, Owner of Anchored Coffee and Roast, said. â€œWeâ€™re going to have a great selection of vendors to help compliment the events going on out here Friday and Saturday.â€ The Easter egg hunt for children five and under will start at 6:00 p.m. on Friday, while the Easter egg hunt for children over five will start at 6:30 p.m. on Friday. For more information, visit the Papa Joeâ€™s Bayside Facebook page . Copyright 2022 WJHG. All rights reserved. Papa Joe's Bayside pairs Brews & Views News Sports Entertainment Opinion Advertise Obituaries eNewspaper Legals BEACH INSIDER Papa Joeâ€™s Bayside pairs Brews & Views Jan Waddy jwaddy@pcnh.com PANAMA CITY â€” Pull up a chair or a boat at Papa Joeâ€™s Bayside. â€œI want this to be a place when you visit Panama City people are like, â€™You got to go to Papa Joeâ€™s,â€™â€ said venue manager Joseph Chapman. â€œItâ€™s a boating community; people should be able to pull up a boat and grab a bite to eat.â€ Since Memorial Day weekend, families have been able to grab a waterfront seat for food truck fare, live music, and lawn games â€” or head out onto St. Andrew Bay for fishing and pontoon rentals. "We rent pontoon boats seven days a week. We have four we own and two are run by another company,â€œ said Chapman, who also added the June 14 Sunday Funday included kayak and paddle board rentals. Pontoon rentals just down the new 500-foot dock run half days, from 9 a.m. to 1 p.m. and full days from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. for visiting Shell Island, fishing in St. Andrew Bay or seeing dolphins. For details, visit PapaJoesPontoons.com. Looking for a free mini puzzle? Play the USA TODAY Quick Cross now. Food trucks, live music from the pavilion and other family activities are scheduled 6-10 p.m. Thursdays through Saturdays and 1 p.m. to sunset Sundays. â€œThe Will Thompson Band is playing every Thursday,â€ Chapman said. Outside lawn chairs are welcome, although thereâ€™s plenty of seating and shade with blue umbrella topped picnic tables in hues of pink, green and blues, an eclectic mix of chairs and benches under a covered pergola â€” or sink your toes in the sand from a chair near the water. â€œEveryone seems to love itâ€™s on this side of the bridge without the beach traffic,â€ Chapman said. â€œItâ€™s hard to see from the road, but you turn in and thereâ€™s a white, sandy beach right on the bay with a beautiful view.â€ The Panama City property at 4601 U.S. 98 just before the Hathaway Bridge had sat vacant since the 2008 Recession â€” two years before Chapman graduated from Mosley High School. â€œThe last two years or so, I thought maybe we should do something with the property,â€ said Chapman, who went to grad school for business at Rollins College after graduating from Florida State University. â€œI wrote my thesis on the property and read it to my uncle (David Chapman) over Easter.â€ The family has been able to put the business plan into action. â€œIt was named after my grandfather who was a businessman for Panama City over 40 years,â€ Chapman said. â€œHe always loved to have a good time and be around family and friends, and we thought what better way to honor him than have a fun community spot named after him.â€ Local businessman and philanthropist Joe Chapman died in 2016. â€œI had a dream Iâ€™d always come back and start something here,â€ Chapman said. â€œI think people are just excited to go somewhere COVID-friendly. Itâ€™s outside; you donâ€™t have to be cooped up. We definitely take the threat seriously. Itâ€™s all outdoors and tables are spread well over six feet.â€ Fireworks were part of the grand opening celebration June 11, but Chapman said they are considering additional fireworks July 2 and a component with special events. â€œLawn games include cornhole on the sand, life-size Connect 4, and Spikeball. Hopefully, weâ€™ll be operational six days a week and start a volleyball league,â€ Chapman said. Tequila Joeâ€™s, a bright blue permanent building on the property, is set to come into fruition this month with specialty tequilas, different margaritas, daquiris and other frozen drinks. No coolers or outside drinks are allowed on the property. Portable restrooms are located on site. Brews & Views Fatherâ€™s Day Weekend at Papa Joeâ€™s Bayside is being touted â€œBrews & Views.â€ Papa Joeâ€™s food truck serves beginning at 6 p.m. every Thursday through Saturday and is working on expanding their menu. â€œWe serve tacos in bowls out of our food truck, and on the weekends, guest food trucks come in for a night,â€ Chapman said. â€œRight now, weâ€™re set up for us plus three food trucks.â€ Guest trucks set to appear Thursday, June 18, included Temperleyâ€™s British Eatery, Crepe and Creme, and Parlor Doughnuts with live entertainment by the Will Thompson Band from 6:30 to 9:30 p.m. Friday, June 19, features Liza's Munchies Machine, All Wrapped Up, and Parlor Doughnuts with live entertainment from the Shawn and Scott Duo on Saturday, June 20, will feature The Nomad, I Roll Lumpia and Parlor Doughnuts with live music from Keystring. For Fatherâ€™s Day on Sunday, additional activities will include raw and chargrilled oysters with a full liquor bar and live music from Few Miles South from 4 to 7 p.m. For updates and more information, visit Facebook.com/PapaJoesBayside/. Bay Fishing Panama City Inshore, docked at Papa Joeâ€™s Bayside, offers half-day trips (four hours) for two anglers, with options to add-on hours and anglers for an additional cost. Rates include tackle, fuel, licenses, snacks and water. Panama City Beach light-tackle and fly fishing guides, including Capt. Justin Leake from Discovery Channelâ€™s â€œChasinâ€™ the Sun,â€ use bay boats and shallow water technical skiffs to target species such as Redfish, Mangrove Snapper, Spanish Mackerel, Trout, Jack Cravelle, and Sheepshead. Visit PanamaCityInshore.com for more information. Bayside Family Church | Who We Are Skip to main content Menu Menu Home About Us Who We Are Our Team Sunday Service Watch Live Connection Card Get Connected Children PD Day Camps Sr Youth Jr Youth Volunteer Worship Team Children's Ministry Teams Giving Library Contact Us Home About Us Who We Are Our Team Sunday Service Watch Live Connection Card Get Connected Children PD Day Camps Sr Youth Jr Youth Volunteer Worship Team Children's Ministry Teams Giving Library Contact Us Who We Are Our Team A Beginning Introduction We, the family at Bayside Family Church, are a gathering of people, striving to be true brothers and sisters, journeying with Christ to become who He wants us to be here. We believe church is a place for the broken to become healed not a museum for saints. This brokenness is at times messy and painful. It is the way it's supposed to be in this portion of the journey of life to real life. Christ's love and our love for Him are the rails that keep us on the right track towards those round about us. The following pun is intentional: without this love we will rail against each other. The New Testament is in many ways a book of relationship; a how to be in relationship with God and a how to be in relationship with others. Many churches have their doctrinal distinctives, we do as well, but a distinctive that we are striving for is simply to like and to love one another, to strive (to quote Paul) to bear the weakness of one another and to not just please ourselves. We aren't there yet but we are trying. It would be a delight to have you part of this journey with us. In this journey our goal is, even with all our imperfections and brokenness, to bring glory to Christ and to show his love to all who we meet. Hypocrisy, false fronts, playing church, hiding hurts, walking alone must all cease. Our hunger is to become the church that God has always wanted us to be. For a more theological explanation about what we believe, please visit the PAOC website. Bayside Family Church P.O. Box 68, 4 Parry Sound Drive, Parry Sound, On. Welcome to Papa Joe's Waterfront Islamorada, Florida Keys Welcome to the reimagined Papa Joeâ€™s Waterfront, a beloved treasure reborn in 2024 on the historic grounds of the original 1938 site. Once a quintessential stop on the Overseas Highway, our new venue melds nostalgia with modern dining experiences. From our lively Tiki Bar (21+) to the family-friendly lawn and elegant dining room with sweeping ocean and bay views, thereâ€™s something for everyone. Enjoy our diverse menus, relax in one of our private oceanfront suites, or dock your boat and stay awhile. Locally owned and operated, we invite both locals and tourists to rediscover the charm of Papa Joeâ€™s Waterfront in Islamorada, Florida. Stunning Waterfront Location Papa Joe's Waterfront offers unmatched sunset views over both the Atlantic and Bayâ€”Providing the BEST sunsets in the Upper Keys. Diverse Menu Options Multiple menus tailored to every settingâ€”from our lively Tiki Bar & serene lawn to our lunch & dinner offerings. Established 1938  Reimagined 2024 At Papa Joeâ€™s Waterfront, we offer tailored dining experiences with separate menus for different settings. In our dining room, guests can indulge in a refined menu featuring a variety of exquisite dishes, perfect for a more formal dining experience. For those enjoying the relaxed atmosphere of our Tiki Bar or the lawn area, we provide a vibrant Tiki Bar menu, full of flavorful bites and creative cocktails designed to complement the casual, scenic outdoor setting. Each menu is crafted to enhance your dining experience, whether youâ€™re looking for sophistication or a laid-back meal by the water. MM 79 Grey Goose Vodka, St. Germaine, Lemon, Topped with Pierre Sparr Cremant Brut Spicy Margarita Spicy Margarita PJ's Sunset Bombay, Passionfruit, Pineapple juice, Lime, Cherry Double Trouble Pilar Blonde and Dark Coconut Cream, OJ, Orgeat Pom & Prickly Pear Margarita Pom & Prickly Pear Margarita Tuna Nachos Our tuna nachos are based on the classic Florida Keys dish that is served on wonton chips. 

Shrimp Chips are very common in Southeast Asia, these are their potato chips (in comparison to America) and are naturally gluten-free and made with tapioca flour. We use fresh Yellowfin Tuna not frozen gas flushed Tuna. Fresh Tuna is often darker red, where as the gas flushed frozen tuna is a bright pink. Unfortunately, most guests are used to this bright pink color in Tuna. It is our responsibility to educate our guests on these facts and what we believe in.
